name: every-time-zone
description: A static timezone overlap visualization tool for easy sharing and collaboration

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets && npm run version:inject
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/*.* dist/ && cp -r src/styles src/scripts dist/ && cp src/favicons/* dist/ && mkdir -p dist/scripts/suncalc && cp node_modules/suncalc/suncalc.js node_modules/suncalc/LICENSE dist/scripts/suncalc/ && mkdir -p dist/scripts/temporal && cp node_modules/@js-temporal/polyfill/dist/index.umd.js dist/scripts/temporal/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run type-check && vitest run

author: Taylor Marvin
